comments.body:
please manually include the license file:

http://conda-forge.github.io/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/sods/paramz
  license: BSD 3-clause
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'
  summary: 'Parameterization Framework for parameterized model creation and handling.'
